org.jcrom.util

Class JcrUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcrom.util.JcrUtils

  • public final class JcrUtils
extends Object
    Contains utilities used for JCR nodes
    Author:
    Nicolas Dos Santos

      • lock

        public static void lock(javax.jcr.Node node,
                        boolean isDeep,
                        boolean isSessionScoped,
                        long timeoutHint,
                        String ownerInfo)
        Places a lock on the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to be locked
        isDeep - if true this lock will apply to this node and all its descendants; if false, it applies only to this node.
        isSessionScoped - if true, this lock expires with the current session; if false it expires when explicitly or automatically unlocked for some other reason.
        timeoutHint - desired lock timeout in seconds (servers are free to ignore this value); specify Long.MAX_VALUE for no timeout.
        ownerInfo - a string containing owner information supplied by the client; servers are free to ignore this value.
        See Also:
        LockManager.lock(String, boolean, boolean, long, String)

      • unlock

        public static void unlock(javax.jcr.Node node)
        Removes the lock on the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node unlock
        See Also:
        LockManager.unlock(String)

        Returns a Value object from the given class and the specified value.

      • parseLocale

        public static Locale parseLocale(String localeString)
        Parses given locale string to Locale object. If the string is empty or null then the we return null.
        Parameters:
        localeString - a string containing locale in language_country_variant format.
        Returns:
        Locale
